title: Sans Serif font for Scientific Journal: Arthritis Research and Therapy
content:
Hi,

I’m working as the designer for the people who publish this journal and it seems that no one in the company has any idea what this font is! Would anyone here be able to help?

Thanks in advance,

G

(image attached)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [AR&T.font-only.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202063811/http:/typophile.com/files/AR&T.font-only.jpg) | 15.35 KB |

 [‹ Help with font id](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202063811/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49963 "Go to previous forum topic") [GQ spain magazine ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202063811/http:/www.typophile.com/node/49942 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Gominosensei

comments.content:
This is [FF Meta Pro Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202063811/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_meta_pro_bold/?sample_text=research%20%26%20therapy) by [Erik Spiekermann](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202063811/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Erik_Spiekermann)

Bye!

Hi Patrick,

It looks like [FF Meta Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202063811/http:/www.fontfont.com/shop/) to me.

Olli

Brilliant! Thanks for the speedy service guys! I’ve only just discovered this site and am loving it already :)

Thanks again!
